name: Variegated Impeccable Acrylic Flutter Scarf Colourway 1
description: Try saying that three times fast.  Impeccable isn't only the name of the yarn, it's the way it looks knit up and ready to be your favourite new neck accessory.  This yarn comes in several colourways, I'm going with a couple basically to see if you agree this stuff makes some mighty cool looking scarves.  Only thing I should mention the colours in the photos aren't quite true.  The predominate colours are varying shades of purple, not blue.  Oh yeah, the scarf is approx 55".  Enjoy!

name: Light Blue Synthetic Seed and Slipstitch Scarf
description:
This particular pattern is one of my favourites, and it isn't even a cable.  There's something about the clean simplicity of the stitch that says 'happy' to me.  That is, if a scarf could talk!  Vocal or not, this scarf is 6" wide and about 63" long.  Soft but light synthetic fibre makes it completely washable.  Wrap yourself in happy and be the chic-est one on the block!

This quality accessory is hand-knit in smoke free environment and comes to you with complete washing and care instructions so as to ensure you years of enjoyment.

Custom options of the items on offer are also available. If you see something you like, but would prefer it longer, or shorter, a different colour, or fibre, drop me a line and we'll do the best to accommodate.

name: Merino Wool Celtic Cable Navy Scarf
description:
It's navy, it's cabled, and would be a great gift for the man in your life.  But maybe you'll want to keep it for yourself!  The intricate celtic-motif cable pattern makes this stunning scarf the perfect fashion accessory .  The scarf is approximately 8" wide and 53" long, and hand knit, in a completely smoke free environment, from Jo Sharp DK 100% Australian Merino Wool.  You'll love the way you look and feel in this quality-crafted treasure.

Custom options of the items on offer are also available.  If you see something you like, but would prefer it longer, or shorter, a different colour, or fibre, drop me a line and we'll do the best to accommodate.

name: Aran Bobble Tube Scarf
description:
approx 9" wide.  Tube measures roughly 27 inches from centre seam when worn.  Hand knit from a durable and completely washable synthetic that makes the intricate and attractive bobbled cable pattern really stand out.  You will love wrapping yourself in this gorgeous, soft, warm and yet extremely light bobbled delight.  It's a tube, so you can just throw it on and go! 

As it is with everything we offer here this classy and quality accessory is hand-knit in smoke free environment and comes to you with complete washing and care instructions so as to ensure you years of enjoyment.
